question: TRIFED organised a National Workshop on Minimum Support Price in __________.
explanation: TRIFED (Tribal Cooperative Marketing Development Federation of India) organised a National Workshop on Minimum Support Price (MSP) for Minor Forest Produce (MFP), in New Delhi. Minister of Tribal Affairs Mr.Jual Oram inaugurated the workshop. The workshop was conducted in order to expand the Minimum Support Price for Minor Forest Procedure scheme throughout India.
